creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: tan; over-the-head garment; oval neckline; long, wide sleeves; bottom hem open except for seams at bottoms of sleeves; off-white stripes horizontal on sleeves and on square patch on proper left chest, vertical on torso; slit-style pocket on proper right front at waist height; tan embroidery: four-diamond pattern and ovals around pocket; spiral on upper proper right chest filled with dot embroidery stitches in shape of circle with lines across it; off-white braid stitch and woven triangle on proper right collar; triangles, squares and loop embroidery on proper left upper chest, with cabled texture in larger embroidered areas; spiral with circle with lines across it formed by dot stitches on upper left back
title: Agbada
